action.action-desc: Mr. Bilirakis (for himself and Mr. Butterfield) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Orphan Drug Act to reauthorize a program of grants and contracts for the development of drugs for rare diseases and conditions (commonly referred to as orphan drugs).

section.header: Reauthorization of grants and contracts for development of orphan drugs
section.text: Section 5(c) of the Orphan Drug Act (21 U.S.C. 360ee(c)) is amended by striking 2018 through 2022 and inserting 2023 through 2027.
